definitions.definition: A person who gives lectures , especially as a profession .
A member of a university or college below the rank of assistant professor or reader ; docent ; lector.
A member of the Church of England clergy whose main task was to deliver sermons ( lectures ) in the afternoons and evenings.

main_definition: A person who gives lectures , especially as a profession .
secondary_definitions: A member of a university or college below the rank of assistant professor or reader ; docent ; lector.
( dated ) A member of the Church of England clergy whose main task was to deliver sermons ( lectures ) in the afternoons and evenings.
